title: assembly halls, one row of uncovered parking may be allowed in the front margin space of 12 m or mor
clause_text: assembly halls, one row of uncovered parking may be allowed in the front margin space of 12 m or more, if the clear vehicular access way is not reduced to less than 6 m

source_pdf.text_snippet: assembly halls, one row of uncovered parking may be allowed in the front margin space of 12 m or more, if the clear vehicular access way is not reduced to less than 6 m
